channel.title: SalesGuru with Mark Keating

description.p: Get motivated and inspired to win.

channel.itunes:subtitle: SALESGURU is a Sales Training and Development company. We are passionate about sales and more specifically sales success, we assist companies with achieving their sales targets and developing their sales managers and their teams.
channel.itunes:author: Mark Keating | Solid Gold Studios
channel.itunes:summary:
Get motivated and inspired to win.
Recorded and produced at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
channel.media:keywords: Another Solid Gold podcast, Gavin Kennedy, #BeHeard
channel.itunes:keywords: Another Solid Gold podcast, Gavin Kennedy, #BeHeard

item.author: salesguru@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Mark Keating | Solid Gold Studios)
item.itunes:author: Mark Keating | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: SA's legendary vehicle salesman | Robbie Robberts
item.itunes:title: SA's legendary vehicle salesman | Robbie Robberts
item.itunes:subtitle: South Africa's Number 1 motor vehicle salesman
item.description:
SalesGuru CEO, Mark Keating, has a conversation with the legendary Ford salesman, Robbie Robberts, days before he left to go sell vehicles in the USA.

Music Used : SAVFK | The Inevitable and Short but Strong!


Let us help you to Build Better Sales People salesguru.co.za


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
